abstract: Ji Yun-Nam (Chosŏn'gŭl: 지윤남; hancha: 志尹南; born 20 November 1976) is a North Korean international association football player, who currently plays for April 25 in the DPR Korea League.
comment: Ji Yun-Nam (Chosŏn'gŭl: 지윤남; hancha: 志尹南; born 20 November 1976) is a North Korean international association football player, who currently plays for April 25 in the DPR Korea League.
